channel.title: Need help with client ip
channel.description:
hi, on a client i downloaded it said i had to edit the client.java to my ip before others can play with the client
but i downloaded another (runewings) client but it doesnt have a client.java only a client.class
if some 1 could help me change the ip on this client to my hamachi ip (i use hamachi because the stupid it man changed my router password)
ty stickywicky

item.title: Need help with client ip

item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

decompile the .class file back to a .java file.
